content.text: How To Host a Static Website
To host a static website, you need a web hosting provider.
content.html: To host a static website, you need a web hosting provider.

content.text: W3Schools provides W3Schools Spaces to host your static website.
content.html: W3Schools provides W3Schools Spaces to host your static website.

content.text: With Spaces, you can easily host your website with a few clicks.
content.html: With Spaces, you can easily host your website with a few clicks.

content.text: It allows you to make static sites with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
content.html: It allows you to make static sites with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

content.text: Hosting Made Easy
W3Schools Spaces saves you time compared to traditional hosting.
content.html: W3Schools Spaces saves you time compared to traditional hosting.

content.text: You don't have to set up SSL certificates on your own.
content.html: You don't have to set up SSL certificates on your own.

content.text: Spaces are secure by default.
content.html: Spaces are secure by default.

content.text: The complexity of hosting a website is hidden.
content.html: The complexity of hosting a website is hidden.

content.text: You can have your files up and running fast.
content.html: You can have your files up and running fast.

content.text: Edit the code directly in the browser!
content.html: Edit the code directly in the browser!

content.text: Secure Website
W3Schools handles the security for you.
content.html: W3Schools handles the security for you.

content.text: Your Space runs on HTTPS protocol.
content.html: Your Space runs on HTTPS protocol.

content.text: Each Space has an SSL certificate.
content.html: Each Space has an SSL certificate.

content.text: SSL certificate is a small file that secures your Space in more ways:
content.html: SSL certificate is a small file that secures your Space in more ways:

content.text: Users are more likely to trust and visit a secure website.
content.html: Users are more likely to trust and visit a secure website.

content.text: The S in the HTTPS protocol stands for Secure.
content.html: The S in the HTTPS protocol stands for Secure.

content.text: It makes your traffic encrypted and secure.
content.html: It makes your traffic encrypted and secure.

content.text: How Do I Get Started?
Get started in a few steps:
content.html: Get started in a few steps:

content.text: The steps are explained in the follwing sections.
content.html: The steps are explained in the follwing sections.

content.text: Create Your W3Schools Account
To create an account, you need to Sign up .
content.html: To create an account, you need to Sign up.

content.text: Sign up with an email and a password.
content.html: Sign up with an email and a password.

content.text: W3Schools Spaces Signup Form
content.html: W3Schools Spaces Signup Form

content.text: Create Your Space
Make your account and head over to Spaces .
content.html: Make your account and head over to Spaces.

content.text: There is a button named "Create a space" in the top right corner.
content.html: There is a button named "Create a space" in the top right corner.

content.text: Clicking the button leads you to the space creation page.
content.html: Clicking the button leads you to the space creation page.

content.text: Create a Space image
content.html: Create a Space image

content.text: You can either start with a blank space or choose a template .
content.html: You can either start with a blank space or choose a template.

content.text: Let's pick the blank space option and click "Continue".
content.html: Let's pick the blank space option and click "Continue".

content.text: Name Your Space
Selecting the blank space option lets you name the space.
content.html: Selecting the blank space option lets you name the space.

content.text: So give your space a cool name.
content.html: So give your space a cool name.

content.text: Naming your space image
content.html: Naming your space image

content.text: Your Space name is a part of the Space URL.
content.html: Your Space name is a part of the Space URL.

content.text: Click the "Continue" button to move on.
content.html: Click the "Continue" button to move on.

content.text: Preview Your Spaces
Choosing a name for your space takes you to the Spaces overview.
content.html: Choosing a name for your space takes you to the Spaces overview.

content.text: The overview is a summary of your Spaces.
content.html: The overview is a summary of your Spaces.

content.text: Things you see in the summary are:
content.html: Things you see in the summary are:

content.text: The Spaces summary help you see how much traffic you have per Space.
content.html: The Spaces summary help you see how much traffic you have per Space.

content.text: Spaces summary image
content.html: Spaces summary image

content.text: Upload Your Files
To upload your files, first, you must open your Space file manager page.
content.html: To upload your files, first, you must open your Space file manager page.

content.text: You can upload your files by clicking on the "Upload files" button.
content.html: You can upload your files by clicking on the "Upload files" button.

content.text: The "Upload files" button is found on the right side of the Spaces summary page.
content.html: The "Upload files" button is found on the right side of the Spaces summary page.

content.text: Spaces file manager image
content.html: Spaces file manager image

content.text: You can create a new file with the "New file" button.
content.html: You can create a new file with the "New file" button.

content.text: Note that the file for your home page must be named index.html .
content.html: Note that the file for your home page must be named index.html.

content.text: The file name index is what browsers will search for as your website starting page.
content.html: The file name index is what browsers will search for as your website starting page.

content.text: Preview Your Website
Your space URL is a combination your Space name and w3spaces subdomain.
content.html: Your space URL is a combination your Space name and w3spaces subdomain.

content.text: For example, if your Space is named jane-doe , your Space URL is jane-doe.w3spaces.com .
content.html: For example, if your Space is named jane-doe, your Space URL is jane-doe.w3spaces.com.

content.text: You can share your Space URL with others.
content.html: You can share your Space URL with others.

content.text: You Made It!
Congratulations!
content.html: Congratulations!

content.text: You successfully hosted your static website.
content.html: You successfully hosted your static website.
